Package net.happybrackets.core.control

Class ControlMap

java.lang.Object
net.happybrackets.core.control.ControlMap
public class ControlMap
extends java.lang.Object
Control Map is a singleton that will store dynamic controls and allow us to access them via their unique map key string

    static interface  ControlMap.dynamicControlCreatedListener
    Create an Interface where we can look for created Dynamic Controls

    Create an Interface where we can look for created Dynamic Controls

    • getControlsByName

      public java.util.List<DynamicControl> getControlsByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Get the Control list by name. If no list exists, it will create a list and add it to controlScopedDevices
      Parameters:
      name - the name used as a search key
      Returns:
      the List of DynamicControls that have that name

    • getControl

      public DynamicControl getControl​(java.lang.String map_key)
      Get the Dynamic Control based on HashCode
      Parameters:
      map_key - the String we are using as the key
      Returns:
      the Dynamic control associated, otherwise null if does not exist

    • removeControl

      public void removeControl​(DynamicControl control)
      Remove all listeners and reference to Dynamic Control
      Parameters:
      control - the control to remove

    • addSensorSimulationControl

      public void addSensorSimulationControl​(DynamicControl control)
      Add a control to the sensorSimulation list. These do not get removed
      Parameters:
      control - the DynamicControl object we are adding

    • isSensorSimulation

      public boolean isSensorSimulation​(DynamicControl control)
      Test if the Dynamic Control is a sensor Simulation
      Parameters:
      control - the DynamicControl object we are adding
      Returns:
      true if has been previously added through addSensorSimulationControl(DynamicControl) ()}

    • clearAllListeners

      public void clearAllListeners()
      Erase all the listeners

      public java.util.List<DynamicControl> GetSortedControls()
      get all Dynamic Controls sorted by creation order
      Returns:
      List of dynamic controls on the device.
